attributes.action: Non-consensual divorce following five years separation (In England and Wales) should be changed to two years
attributes.additional_details:
(In England and Wales) Currently 5 years  and 2 years separation is required for non-consensual  and consensual  divorce respectively.

Why do we expect couples to wait 5 years for non-consensual  divorce? This separation period should be changed to 2 years for non-consensual divorce.

In Scotland the separation period for non-consensual  and consensual divorce is 1 year and 2 years respectively.
